hackathon-description-text: Presenting sponsor of the Hackathon, General Assembly will host a 24-hour hackathon - join developers and hackers for an all-day frenzy of fun, camaraderie and coding.  At the end, each team will have created an entirely new application that they will showcase to a panel of judges in the hopes of being crowned the winners!

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Startup and Developer Attractor at Rackspace
Hackathon Hacker at Major League Hacking

hackathon-eligibility: Teams can consists of only one person but not more than five.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Rackspace — $2,000 per month in hosting credits for 12 months
Two American Airlines flights anywhere in the US and 5 Summit Passes from Techweek.
Total dollar amount goes to winning team.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Special Prize - Best Use of Sinch SDK - $500 courtesy of Sinch

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=1520 2nd Street, Santa Monica, CA 90401, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: You are not required to explain how your app makes money, unless that is part of the problem you solve.

hackathon-description-header: Join us at General Assembly for the Techweek Los Angeles Hackathon.
